name: High Tide Helicopters
baseAirport: SUT -Cape Fear Regional Jetport/Howie Franklin Field
about: At High Tide Aviation, we are more than just a flight school; we are your premier gateway to experiencing the skies. Based in Southport, NC, and St Simons Island, GA, our team offers comprehensive flight training programs in both helicopters and airplanes. Our mission is to provide safe, enjoyable, and unforgettable aerial experiences, combining adventure and unique perspectives of the scenic landscapes below. We offer scenic air tours, aerial photography and videography services, and special event flights. Our ground school program, led by expert instructors, equips aspiring pilots with essential knowledge from principles of flight to federal regulations. Whether you're pursuing recreational flying or a professional pilot career, High Tide Aviation is dedicated to enhancing your understanding and appreciation of aviation, ensuring a lifetime of success in the skies. Join us for an incredible learning and flying experience.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Intro Flight
